Communications Associate Job at Reliance Health




        
    

        
        Reliance Health uses Technology to Make Healthcare Accessible and Affordable. Through an integrated approach that includes affordable health insurance, telemedicine, and a combination of partner and proprietary healthcare facilities, Reliance Health offers innovative healthcare solutions that meet the needs of emerging markets.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Communications Associate

Job Location: Remote
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are looking for a creative and culturally attuned Communications Associate to support our brand’s growth and engagement across digital platforms in Nigeria. The ideal candidate will bring strong experience in content creation, social media management, and community engagement, combined with a strong understanding of the local audience.
	This role is perfect for someone who is both creative and strategic, thrives in a fast-paced environment, and is passionate about building meaningful online communities through compelling content.


Responsibilities
As the Communication Associate, you will:


	Create engaging social media content that aligns with the brand’s voice and style.
	Curate and schedule posts to maintain consistency across platforms.
	Assist in producing multimedia content such as infographics, short videos, and graphics.
	Manage daily interactions on social media, responding to comments and messages promptly.
	Track basic metrics like engagement, reach, and follower growth, and recommend improvements.
	Stay updated on social media trends and propose creative content ideas.
	Monitor competitor activity and industry conversations to gather insights.
	Identify potential brand risks on social platforms and escalate when necessary.
	Participate in online discussions to build community and cultivate loyal followers.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s in Communications, Marketing, PR, or similar.
	1–2 years of experience in social media, content creation, or community engagement.
	Strong familiarity with social media management tools.
	Strong writing, editing, and visual communication skills.
	Basic understanding of analytics.
	Able to handle multiple tasks in a fast-paced environment.


Benefits
At Reliance Health, we prioritize our people and their well-being. Our benefits package is designed to support your success, growth, and happiness. Here’s what you’ll enjoy:


	Competitive Salary and Benefits: We offer a salary that’s benchmarked against the best in the industry, ensuring your expertise and impact are fully rewarded.
	Premium Health Insurance: Comprehensive health coverage for you and your family, because your well-being comes first.
	Unlimited Leave: Take the time you need when you need it—no limits, no questions.
	Meaningful Impact: Play a key role in transforming customer experiences and shaping healthcare innovation.
	Collaborative Work Culture: Join a supportive, inclusive, and team-focused environment that celebrates diversity.
	Growth Opportunities: Access tools, mentorship, and resources to elevate your skills and career.
	Learning & Development Allowance: We provide an allowance to support your ongoing professional growth and skill enhancement.
